channel.title: Python Reference on ResInsight
channel.description: Recent content in Python Reference on ResInsight

item.title: Case
item.description: Case Case(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The ResInsight base class for Cases Attributes: file_path str - Case File Name id int - Case ID name str - Case Name grid Case.grid(index) Get Grid of a given index. Returns a rips Grid object Arguments: index int - The grid index Returns - Grid object grids Case.grids() Get a list of all rips Grid objects in the case

item.title: CellColors
item.description: CellColors CellColors(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) Eclipse Cell Colors class

item.title: EclipseCase
item.description: EclipseCase EclipseCase(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Regular Eclipse Results Case

item.title: EclipseContourMap
item.description: EclipseContourMap EclipseContourMap(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A contour map for Eclipse cases export_to_text EclipseContourMap.export_to_text(export_file_name='', export_local_coordinates=False, undefined_value_label='NaN', exclude_undefined_values=False) Export snapshot for the current view Arguments: export_file_name(str) - The file location to store results in. export_local_coordinates(bool) - Should we export local coordinates, or UTM. undefined_value_label(str) - Replace undefined values with this label. exclude_undefined_values(bool) - Skip undefined values.

item.title: EclipseResult
item.description: EclipseResult EclipseResult(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) An eclipse result definition Attributes: flow_tracer_selection_mode str - Tracers phase_selection str - Phases porosity_model_type str - Porosity result_type str - Type result_variable str - Variable selected_injector_tracers str - Injector Tracers selected_producer_tracers str - Producer Tracers selected_souring_tracers str - Tracers

item.title: EclipseView
item.description: EclipseView EclipseView(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Eclipse 3d Reservoir View cell_result EclipseView.cell_result() Cell Result Returns: CellColors cell_result_data EclipseView.cell_result_data() Current Eclipse Cell Result Returns: str set_cell_result_data EclipseView.set_cell_result_data(values) Set Current Eclipse Cell Result Arguments: values str - data

item.title: FileSummaryCase
item.description: FileSummaryCase FileSummaryCase(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A Summary Case based on SMSPEC files Attributes: include_restart_files str - Include Restart Files

item.title: FileWellPath
item.description: FileWellPath FileWellPath(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) Well Paths Loaded From File

item.title: GeoMechCase
item.description: GeoMechCase GeoMechCase(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Abaqus Based GeoMech Case views GeoMechCase.views() All GeoMech Views in the Case Returns: List of GeoMechView

item.title: GeoMechContourMap
item.description: GeoMechContourMap GeoMechContourMap(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A contour map for GeoMech cases export_to_text GeoMechContourMap.export_to_text(export_file_name='', export_local_coordinates=False, undefined_value_label='NaN', exclude_undefined_values=False) Export snapshot for the current view Arguments: export_file_name(str) - The file location to store results in. export_local_coordinates(bool) - Should we export local coordinates, or UTM. undefined_value_label(str) - Replace undefined values with this label. exclude_undefined_values(bool) - Skip undefined values.

item.title: GeoMechView
item.description: GeoMechView GeoMechView(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Geomechanical 3d View

item.title: GridCaseGroup
item.description: GridCaseGroup GridCaseGroup(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A statistics case group Attributes: group_id int - Case Group ID user_description str - Name create_statistics_case GridCaseGroup.create_statistics_case() Create a Statistics case in the Grid Case Group Returns: A new Case statistics_cases GridCaseGroup.statistics_cases() Get a list of all statistics cases in the Grid Case Group views GridCaseGroup.views() Get a list of views belonging to a grid case group view GridCaseGroup.view(view_id) Get a particular view belonging to a case group by providing view id

item.title: GridSummaryCase
item.description: GridSummaryCase GridSummaryCase(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A Summary Case based on extracting grid data.

item.title: Instance
item.description: Instance Instance(self, port=50051, launched=False) The ResInsight Instance class. Use to launch or find existing ResInsight instances Attributes: launched bool - Tells us whether the application was launched as a new process. If the application was launched we may need to close it when exiting the script. commands Commands - Command executor. Set when creating an instance. project Project - Current project in ResInsight. Set when creating an instance and updated when opening/closing projects.

item.title: ModeledWellPath
item.description: ModeledWellPath ModeledWellPath(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A Well Path created interactively in ResInsight

item.title: Plot
item.description: Plot Plot(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Abstract Base Class for all Plot Objects

item.title: PlotWindow
item.description: PlotWindow PlotWindow(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Abstract base class for all MDI Windows in the Plot Window Attributes: id int - View ID export_snapshot PlotWindow.export_snapshot(export_folder='', file_prefix='', output_format='PNG') Export snapshot for the current plot Arguments: export_folder(str) - The path to export to. By default will use the global export folder prefix str - Exported file name prefix output_format(str) - Enum string. Can be ‘PNG’ or ‘PDF’.

item.title: Project
item.description: Project Project(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The ResInsight Project open Project.open(path) Open a new project from the given path Arguments: path(str) - path to project file save Project.save(path='') Save the project to the existing project file, or to a new file Arguments: path(str) - File path to the file to save the project to. If empty, saves to the active project file close Project.close() Close the current project (and open new blank project)

item.title: Reservoir
item.description: Reservoir Reservoir(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) Abtract base class for Eclipse Cases views Reservoir.views() All Eclipse Views in the case Returns: List of EclipseView

item.title: SimulationWell
item.description: SimulationWell SimulationWell(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) An Eclipse Simulation Well Attributes: name str - Name

item.title: SummaryCase
item.description: SummaryCase SummaryCase(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Base Class for all Summary Cases Attributes: auto_shorty_name str - Use Auto Display Name short_name str - Display Name summary_header_filename str - Summary Header File

item.title: SummaryPlot
item.description: SummaryPlot SummaryPlot(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A Summary Plot Attributes: is_using_auto_name str - Auto Title normalize_curve_y_values str - Normalize all curves plot_description str - Name show_plot_title str - Plot Title

item.title: SummaryPlotCollection
item.description: SummaryPlotCollection SummaryPlotCollection(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) new_summary_plot SummaryPlotCollection.new_summary_plot(summary_cases=[], ensemble=None, address=None) Create a new Summary Plot Arguments: summary_cases List of SummaryCase - Summary Cases ensemble SummaryCaseSubCollection - Ensemble address str - Formatted address string specifying the plot options Returns: SummaryPlot

item.title: View
item.description: View View(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) Attributes: background_color str - Background current_time_step int - Current Time Step disable_lighting str - Disable Results Lighting grid_z_scale float - Z Scale id int - View ID perspective_projection str - Perspective Projection show_grid_box str - Show Grid Box show_z_scale str - Show Z Scale Label apply_cell_result View.apply_cell_result(result_type, result_variable) Apply a regular cell result Arguments: result_type str - String representing the result category. The valid values are DYNAMIC_NATIVE STATIC_NATIVE SOURSIMRL GENERATED INPUT_PROPERTY FORMATION_NAMES FLOW_DIAGNOSTICS INJECTION_FLOODING result_variable str - String representing the result variable.

item.title: ViewWindow
item.description: ViewWindow ViewWindow(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Base Class for all Views and Plots in ResInsight case ViewWindow.case() Get the case the view belongs to export_snapshot ViewWindow.export_snapshot(prefix='', export_folder='') Export snapshot for the current view Arguments: prefix str - Exported file name prefix export_folder(str) - The path to export to. By default will use the global export folder

item.title: WbsParameters
item.description: WbsParameters WbsParameters(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) Attributes: df_source str - Depletion Factor (DF) fg_multiplier float - SH Multiplier for FG in Shale fg_shale_source str - FG in Shale Calculation k0_fg_source str - K0_FG k0_sh_source str - K0_SH obg0_source str - Initial Overburden Gradient poission_ratio_source str - Poisson Ratio pore_pressure_non_reservoir_source str - Non-Reservoir Pore Pressure pore_pressure_reservoir_source str - Reservoir Pore Pressure ucs_source str - Uniaxial Compressive Strength user_df float - User Defined DF user_k0_fg float - User Defined K0_FG user_k0_sh float - User Defined K0_SH user_poisson_ratio float - User Defined Poisson Ratio user_pp_non_reservoir float - Multiplier of hydrostatic PP user_ucs float - User Defined UCS [bar] water_density float - Density of Sea Water [g/cm^3]

item.title: WellBoreStabilityPlot
item.description: WellBoreStabilityPlot WellBoreStabilityPlot(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A GeoMechanical Well Bore Stabilit Plot parameters WellBoreStabilityPlot.parameters() Well Bore Stability Parameters Returns: WbsParameters

item.title: WellLogPlot
item.description: WellLogPlot WellLogPlot(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) A Well Log Plot With a shared Depth Axis and Multiple Tracks Attributes: auto_scale_depth_enabled str - Auto Scale depth_type str - Type depth_unit str - Unit maximum_depth float - Max minimum_depth float - Min show_depth_grid_lines str - Show Grid Lines show_title_in_plot str - Show Title export_data_as_las WellLogPlot.export_data_as_las(export_folder, file_prefix='', export_tvdrkb=False, capitalize_file_names=False, resample_interval=0.0, convert_to_standard_units=False) Export LAS file(s) for the current plot Arguments: export_folder(str) - The path to export to.

item.title: WellPath
item.description: WellPath WellPath(self, pb2_object=None, channel=None) The Base class for Well Paths Attributes: name str - Name
